description: Super Bowl 2025 prediction: 'You've got the dethrone Mahomes'
title: Super Bowl 2025 prediction: 'You've got the dethrone Mahomes'
title_page: Super Bowl 2025 prediction: 'You've got the dethrone Mahomes' - BBC Sport
maintext:
NFL analyst Jason Bell on how the Eagles win:
"You've got to dethrone Mahomes. Until somebody does that, you've got to back the Chiefs. Josh Allen went close but not close enough â€“ and he's the MVP.
"You just have to look at what Mahomes does on third downs. They're crucial, so that's how you really assess a quarterback."
